channel.title: Can this Happen or Not
channel.description:
I would like to host a Server on my Domain www.drag-central.org
Atm its an online Racing Game and i would liek to make it a Runescape Private server
How do i set one up so i can Run the game 24/7 from that host
Like with the login i want it to be
Username: Password: Ip Address: Drag-central.org <<< not my Ip Address
Am i able to Run a Server from my Host / Domain.... If so PLEASE help....
thanks Expired User[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 25, 2008, 02:47:17 am[/size][hr]Someone please help i would like to get this server running asap....
All the server files are finished i jsut need to know how 2 set it up on my host.....[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 26, 2008, 03:29:16 am[/size][hr]Does Anyone know how to do it... Please help
